JobFullDesc: We are looking for a deeply technical Senior Program Manager to come and join the Azure Quality Infrastructure (AQI) team, reporting out of the Azure Edge + Core Office of the CTO. Azure’s customers continually express that solid fundamentals are their highest priority, and the AQI team was formed to address that need. The AQI team facilitates projects that span the entirety of Azure, working directly with senior members of leadership to affect impactful changes on the way the organization thinks about and improves the quality of Azure’s infrastructure and services.ResponsibilitiesAs a Senior Program Manager on the AQI team, you will have the incredible opportunity to work on business-critical initiatives that directly contribute to the future of Azure’s business. You must be deeply technical and be able to ramp up in new areas quickly since your responsibilities will span all areas of Azure’s business. Exceptional public speaking, writing, and interpersonal relationship skills are also required since you will represent the Office of the CTO when interfacing with members of senior leadership, and when proposing and facilitating the design of features that span whole organizations within Azure.QualificationsRequired:7+ years of Program Management, Product Management, Technical Program Management, Software Engineering, Architecture, Cloud Solution Architecture, Customer Software Engineering, Field Engineering or similar experiencesBA/BS degree or higher in computer science, engineering or related discipline or equivalent combination of education and work experience in lieu of education.Preferred:Experienced in guiding partners and/or customers thru adoption life cycle with hands-on guidance, reference architectures and depth engagementCustomer obsession coupled with strong problem-solving skillsAdvanced knowledge and experiences with Azure and/or other public cloud platformsEffective presentation skills and experience with engaging audiences of all levelsEffective in rapidly evolving environments and working across organizational boundariesExperienced in advocating for customer and partner successSelf-starter, skilled-listener, strong collaborator, strong writing skillsAvid learner, who enjoys researching new techniques and best practices, as well as teaching others•             Advanced degrees (MS or PhD in engineering Ability to meet Microsoft, customer and/or government security screening requirements are required for this role.
